analysis.description:
Object.withdrawnTokens (/unique_chucks/41/0xd19a16e097af43642346cff4ecd2c81472ee8bf6.sol#140-151) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(token).transfer(_to,balance) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd19a16e097af43642346cff4ecd2c81472ee8bf6.sol#148-149)

ERC20.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/41/0xd19a16e097af43642346cff4ecd2c81472ee8bf6.sol#226-227)
ERC20Interface.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/41/0xd19a16e097af43642346cff4ecd2c81472ee8bf6.sol#121)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/41/0xd19a16e097af43642346cff4ecd2c81472ee8bf6.sol#80-81:
	- Usage of "suicide()" should be replaced with "selfdestruct()"
